content:
PokerFace's Flavorless Normal

Upcoming Deadlines:
Night 4 Deadline Countdown
(expired on 2014-09-16 13:00:00)

The Rules, Stolen from shaft.ed, TSQ, Mr. Stoofer, Flameaxe, Jdodge:
00. I reserve the right to edit these rules at any time should something truly unexpected occur.

01. All votes must be made bold or made using the vote tag. Unvoting is not required but I heavily prefer it. Any attempts at disguising your voting will be prohibited. If its treated as a vote and I think its a vote, its a a vote!

02. A majority of votes is required to lynch. If there is a lynch, no amount of bitching will prevent the lynch from happening. I am a moderator, not a charity.

03. When you live, live well. Live long. Prosper. When you're dead, shut up. Don't post in the games thread. Lie in a grave/furnace/corpse pile. Rot.

04. All days have a 14 day deadline. All nights have a 48 hour deadline. The thread will lock during night given the nature of the game

05. You can vote for no lynch to occur during the day. Simply post VOTE: No Lynch. Should this vote reach a majority, it will happen. If no majority is reached during a day then there will be a no lynch when that day ends

06. Quoting or faking any PMs you receive from the mod will get you modkilled and blacklisted from any games I am running now or in the future. You may paraphrase anything in the PM. If you are worried you are quoting more so then paraphrasing you should probably PM me before I modkill you

07. Each player must post every 48 hours. If they do not, I will prod them. If they don't respond to the prod in 2 days, then they will be replaced. If you have already received 2 prods and you go idle for 48 hours a 3rd time, I will force replace you. This rule will be temporarily ignored if you give V/la notice 2 days before going V/la. Anyone found to be faking V/la will be mod killed

08. Don't talk to each other outside of the game thread unless your role says you can. If you disobey this rule, you will be modkilled or force replaced pending the severity of your actions

09. No small or invisible text. Don’t edit/delete previously submitted posts if you have the power to do so

10. This is a game. Have fun and respect the other players.

11. If it seems like it should be illegal, it probably is. Considering the fact rules sometimes can't cover everything. Please use your common sense. PM me if you think something you are about to do could break the rules or possibly ruin the game.

12. I am human. If I fuck up and make a mod error that personally looses you the game, then I will give you a technical auto win at the end of the game to make up for it

13. I respect anonymity on the internet and in mafia. If there is a scum group with a quick topic or private topic, I will NOT be posting a link to it at the end of the game. It is that scum teams decision as to whether or not a link to their quick topic or private topic will be posted at the end of the game

14. If I have to modkill a player, the following will occur. If that player was town, the day will immediately end as though they were the lynch. If that player was non-town the day will continue. Basically the worst case scenario will occur for their side. Please don't make me have to invoke this rule or any modkill related rules. I don't want to do it, I felt bad just writing them

15. The game will start with a Pregame phase. During this phase, any roles with the power to night talk may talk. Pregame will last 48 hours, you must PM a confirm to me saying you received and understand your role during Pregame, or i will look to replace you during day 1

16. If you have a night action and think you will be V/la during the night cycle, you can send the action to me in advance

17. If you have a night action and have already sent a target for your action, you can change your target before the night is over by sending me a message with the new choice

18. If you have a night action and forget to send me a choice, you get nothing.

19. Posting in the game thread can be done during twilight by any living player including the person who was just lynched, up until the mod locks the thread

20: If you ask for a player to be prodded and this player posts before I send him the prod, it does not count as one of their allowed prods. I got to send it to them for it to count. I'll send them "I'm replacing you" in the 3rd message. This message must be sent before I replace them. Once its sent, no matter of posting will stop it. I plan to send this same message when a player doesn't answer/post after an allowed prod and the same rules will apply there. Once I say "I'm replacing you" it will happen

Vanilla Townie PM:
You are a Vanilla Townie. You have no night actions. Use your vote during the day to help lynch all non-town players. You win when all non-town players have been eliminated. You do not have to be alive in order to win. Good luck

Spoiler: Travel Between Planets On Horses
Horses are magic animals and these are very ancient animals.

Horses were created by designers of Life specially for Magicians. They were called by Riders. And trillions years ago Riders had horses.

How there is a travel? The rider gets onto a horse, then disperses before gallop, and then there is a teleportation from one place in another.

Movement is possible and in a planet, interstellar travel are an aerobatics.

How it works? Between a horse and the Rider the magic contract has to be signed. Such contracts are signed with horses of a certain breed, for example only with white horses or only with black or red horses.

It is necessary to tell that there are such intelligence services which are engaged in designing of Life of plants and animals. Them call the master of Life. Masters of life marked magic properties of fruit, vegetables and animals with color. So for example red apples have absolutely other magic properties than green apples. Or white vegetable marrows of a grade of Gribovskiye have absolutely other magic properties than green Tsukini.

With horses this rule work too - white horses strongly differ from the black ones.

It doesn't make to build spaceships any sense, it is possible as to travel simply on horses.


Masters of life specially changed a genotype of horses so that the horse had no wisdom teeth, on a place of these teeth at a horse are destiny which don't stir a horse is.


I have a contract with some breeds of horses - with black and red breeds.


It is necessary to tell that Riders existed during existence of Atlantis and They were at war with Atlases. Besides, Riders are far ancestors Lunarians
from the Moon.

The first short-sighted look Riders on horses are representatives of a primitive civilization. Actually is a far future of mankind.

The spacehorses have left their mark

I'm going to spell this out for you.

If you are town, in a game with 11 other players, presumably 3 of which are scum, that means you have a random chance of voting scum 3 out of 11 times (27%) and town 8 out of 11 times (73%).

Scum knows who is town and who isn't, so if a bad townie makes a fool of himself and gets a large wagon, who do you think is going to vote it. A few townies (73% of them maybe, as a reasonable guess), and maybe 2 of the 3 scum?

So when I see two townies, now dead, WHICH MAKES THEM CONFIRMED TOWNIES NOW, and FIVE players were on both those wagons, I'm guessing scum are in that list. Probably at least two. What do you think?

But yet you seem to think scum avoided BOTH of those wagons. Because that is what I did and that is what you are calling me (scum).

I'm going to clue everyone into mafia 101:

1) scum like to vote town
2) scum like to do it without drawing attention, which usually means not starting the wagon and...
3) ...not voting obvious town (aka, picking easy targets, which are those who usually draw large wagons)
4) scum like to not give lots of reads (that way they are free to maneuver more)
5) scum like to play the good guy feature, which means if someone claims, let's jump to another wagon cause look at me, I'm a good townie

and so on and so forth.

Dessew, when I scumhunt, I think what would I do as scum. Is that player doing it, or not.

Cyberbob has done almost all of those items above.

One could say IAI has not done 1, 2 (started a Cyberbob wagon, Cooldog wagon, pushed RC hard after he claimed), 3, 4, and 5.

Call my posts arrogant, but if you are town, ask yourself 'what would scum do'. You will find many answers in that and become a much better scumhunter I promise.

This is the first post wrote:
The Rules, Stolen from shaft.ed, TSQ, Mr. Stoofer, Flameaxe, Jdodge:
00. I reserve the right to edit these rules at any time should something truly unexpected occur.

01. All votes must be made bold or made using the vote tag. Unvoting is not required but I heavily prefer it. Any attempts at disguising your voting will be prohibited. If its treated as a vote and I think its a vote, its a a vote!

02. A majority of votes is required to lynch. If there is a lynch, no amount of bitching will prevent the lynch from happening. I am a moderator, not a charity.

03. When you live, live well. Live long. Prosper. When you're dead, shut up. Don't post in the games thread. Lie in a grave/furnace/corpse pile. Rot.

04. All days have a 14 day deadline. All nights have a 48 hour deadline. The thread will lock during night given the nature of the game

05. You can vote for no lynch to occur during the day. Simply post VOTE: No Lynch. Should this vote reach a majority, it will happen. If no majority is reached during a day then there will be a no lynch when that day ends

06. Quoting or faking any PMs you receive from the mod will get you modkilled and blacklisted from any games I am running now or in the future. You may paraphrase anything in the PM. If you are worried you are quoting more so then paraphrasing you should probably PM me before I modkill you

07. Each player must post every 48 hours. If they do not, I will prod them. If they don't respond to the prod in Y days, then they will be replaced. If you have already received 2 prods and you go idle for 48 hours a 3rd time, I will force replace you. This rule will be temporarily ignored if you give V/la notice 2 days before going V/la. Anyone found to be faking V/la will be mod killed

08. Don't talk to each other outside of the game thread unless your role says you can. If you disobey this rule, you will be modkilled or force replaced pending the severity of your actions

09. No small or invisible text. Don’t edit/delete previously submitted posts if you have the power to do so

10. This is a game. Have fun and respect the other players. Don't be a dick.

11. If it seems like it should be illegal, it probably is. Considering the fact rules sometimes can't cover everything. Please use your common sense. PM me if you think something you are about to do could break the rules or possibly ruin the game.

12. I am human. If I fuck up and make a mod error that personally looses you the game, then I will give you a technical auto win at the end of the game to make up for it

13. I respect anonymity on the internet and in mafia. If there is a scum group with a QT, I will NOT be posting a link to it at the end of the game. It is that scum teams decision as to whether or not a link to their QT will be posted at the end of the game

14. If I have to modkill a player, the following will occur. If that player was town, the day will immediately end as though they were the lynch. If that player was non-town the day will continue. Basically the worst case scenario will occur for their side. Please don't make me have to invoke this rule or any modkill related rules. I don't want to do it. I felt bad just writing this

15. The game will start with a Pregame phase. During this phase, any roles with the power to night talk may talk. Pregame will last 48 hours, you must PM a confirm to me saying you received and understand your role during Pregame, or i will look to replace you during day 1

16. If you have a night action and think you will be V/la during the night cycle, you can send the action to me in advance

17. If you have a night action and have already sent a target for your action, you can change you target before the night is over by sending me a message with the new choice

18. If you have a night action and forget to send me a choice, you get nothing.

19. Posting in the game thread can be done during twilight by any living player including the person who was just lynched, up until the mod locks the thread
